name: Just a normal Game (Cleytulf)
description:
Just a Normal Game  is a Tower Defense game with a parodic purpose. The goal is to defend you solid state from installing any other games than your's.

But in order to do it,you'll have to uninstall a lot of games from your solid state.

You'll have to be carefull about how you distribute the energy between your components and you softwares like "CCleanning" or "McCofee", which will help you to make some free space.

GameDesign :

  • BOTELLA Mathieu
  • PODEVIN Benoît
  • ISTASSE Rémy

This game was made in 72h during the MiniGameJam from September 202
